alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 4:06PM PDT until April 02 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Central and Eastern Lake County, including portions of Highway 140. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
